PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-01502021-03-15,  ,  ,  HC,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectInterim Order No. 2 Respecting Drugs, Medical Devices and Foods for a Special Dietary Purpose in Relation to COVID-19
PrecisOrder approving the INTERIM ORDER NO. 2 RESPECTING DRUGS, MEDICAL DEVICES AND FOOD FOR A SPECIAL DIETARY PURPOSE IN RELATION TO COVID-19, made by the Minister of Health on March 1, 2021 in order to continue to prevent or alleviate the effects of health product shortages caused or exacerbated, directly or indirectly, by COVID-19.
AttachmentsAttachment
